parameters.name: AttackPathAssetList
parameters.description: List of cloud product assets in the attack path.

parameters.name: CurrentPage
parameters.description: Specifies from which page of the returned results the query results should be displayed. The default value is 1, indicating that the display starts from the first page.

parameters.name: EndTime
parameters.description: Timestamp of the end time. Unit: milliseconds.

parameters.name: Lang
parameters.description:
Sets the language type for requests and received messages, with the default being **zh**. Values:

- **zh**: Chinese
- **en**: English

parameters.name: PageSize
parameters.description: The maximum number of data entries displayed per page in a paginated query. The default value is **20**.

parameters.name: PathNameDesc
parameters.description:
Description of the path name.
> You can call [ListAvailableAttackPath](~~ListAvailableAttackPath~~) to query the path name description.

parameters.name: PathType
parameters.description:
Path type.
> You can call [ListAvailableAttackPath](~~ListAvailableAttackPath~~) to query the path type.

parameters.name: StartTime
parameters.description: Timestamp of the start time. Unit: milliseconds.
